module.name: assembly_physical_interface_requirement
module.keywords: module, assembly interface detailed design, critical component placement, mating connector, fit, design volume, physical layer, protocol

abstract.p: the representation of the information needed to describe the manner by which an electronic assembly shall mechanically interface to the next higher assembly. The type of mating connector and its location relative to the electronic assembly are provided as a design requirement, that must be satisfied in the design. The module includes representation of the information needed to describe a physical layer of a communication protocol at a connector interface level.
abstract.li: physical protocol layer description including connector pinout mapping to signal names;

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the manner by which an electronic assembly shall mechanically interface to the next higher assembly. The type of mating connector and its location relative to the electronic assembly are provided as a design requirement, that must be satisfied in the design.
The module includes representation of the information needed to describe a physical layer of a communication protocol at a connector interface level.
purpose.note: A subset of this module may be applied in the case where the only requirement is the physical protocol layer description.

inscope.li: physical protocol layer description including connector pinout mapping to signal names;
items within the scope of application module Assembly functional interface requirement, ISO/TS 10303-1635;
items within the scope of application module Layered 3d shape, ISO/TS 10303-1694;
items within the scope of application module Printed physical layout template, ISO/TS 10303-1737.
